activities: BrandVia Alliance, Inc. operates web stores on behalf of client companies as the authorized merchant of branded promotional merchandise. Information BrandVia gathers on these sites is strictly limited to the information we need to accept, process and fulfill orders on this site, to provide customer service, to monitor and evaluate the site’s activity and performance, and to provide reports to the clients on whose behalf we operate the web store.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect contact information such as name, email address, mailing address, phone number      • Billing Information such as credit card number, and billing address  We also collect the following information from you such as:      • Information about your business such as company name, company size, business type, manually entered by our users
